summary: This document is an invoice from NYSG LLC for FedEx services dated March 1, 2002. It details transportation charges and payment information, including sender and recipient details, as well as instructions for adjustments and payment due dates.

persons.name: Darren K Mime
persons.context: Darren K Mime is listed as the sender associated with the FedEx shipment.

persons.name: Peter H Bem
persons.context: Peter H Bem is identified as the recipient of the FedEx shipment.

persons.name: A Smith
persons.context: A Smith is mentioned as having received the package on February 20, 2002.

events.title: Package Pickup
events.description: A package was picked up by FedEx for delivery.

events.title: Package Delivery
events.description: The package was delivered and received by A Smith.

keyFacts: The invoice number is 4-117-76882 and the invoice date is March 1, 2002.
The total charges for the FedEx services amount to $5.34.
The package was picked up on February 19, 2002, and delivered on February 20, 2002.
Darren K Mime is the sender associated with the shipment.
Peter H Bem is the recipient of the shipment.
